# AutoApi.Client

> C# client for auto-api.com — car listings API from 8 automotive marketplaces (encar, mobile.de, autoscout24, che168, dongchedi, guazi, dubicars, dubizzle).

## Install

dotnet add package AutoApi.Client

## Quick Start

using AutoApi;
using var client = new AutoApiClient("your-api-key", "https://api1.auto-api.com");
var offers = await client.GetOffersAsync("encar", new OffersParams { Page = 1, Brand = "BMW" });

## API Methods

- GetFiltersAsync(source) — available filters (brands, models, body types)
- GetOffersAsync(source, params) — search listings with pagination and filters
- GetOfferAsync(source, innerId) — single listing by ID
- GetChangeIdAsync(source, date) — get change_id by date (yyyy-mm-dd)
- GetChangesAsync(source, changeId) — changes feed (added/changed/removed)
- GetOfferByUrlAsync(url) — listing data by marketplace URL

## Auth

- GET requests: api_key query parameter
- POST /api/v1/offer/info: x-api-key header

## Links

- [Documentation](https://auto-api.com)
- [Source Code](https://github.com/autoapicom/auto-api-dotnet)
